mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATCHMNFL_DETAIL ( ATCHMNFL_NO, ATCHMNFL_ID, FRST_WRTER_TM, FRST_WRTER_ID, FLPTH, STRE_FL_NM, ATCHMNFL_SIZE, ATCHMNFL_TY, ORGINL_ATCHMNFL_NM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, LAST_UPDT_TM, DEL_YN ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(ATCHMNFL_NO), 0) + 1 FROM ATCHMNFL_DETAIL), (SELECT MAX(ATCHMNFL_ID) FROM ATCHMNFL), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{frstWrterId}, #{flpth}, #{streFlNm}, #{atchmnflSize}, #{atchmnflTy}, #{orginlAtchmnflNm}, #{lastUpdusrId}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(ATCHMNFL_ID) AS ATCHMNFL_ID FROM ATCHMNFL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATCHMNFL( ATCHMNFL_ID, FRST_WRTER_ID, FRST_WRTER_TM, DEL_YN, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, LAST_UPDT_TM ) VALUES ( (SELECT 'ATT' || LPAD(MAX(SUBSTR(ATCHMNFL_ID, 4)) + 1, 6, '0') FROM ATCHMNFL), #{frstWrterId}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'N', #{lastUpdusrId}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') )
